name: Chatot
description: The Music Note Pokémon. It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Attacks against this Pokémon have disadvantage when it is confused.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.
